segments.text: My gaze is drawn to the children in the center of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, quite high up, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a small, two-step stool, which looks very wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, almost as if it's about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand deep inside a jar labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's definitely taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he's balanced, stretching for those treats, is truly alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised he hasn't tumbled backward already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's even holding a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a very precarious situation for such a young child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies must be incredibly tempting for him to take such a risk.
segments.speaker: PAR
